title: Superposition

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You many select two players. Players that visit you will instead have their visit Redirected to the two players you selected. (3 uses)
- Once you run out of uses, you will automatically visit two random players each night afterwards.
- Redirect Immune players will simply visit you.

desc:
Post 5408
*Quantum superposition is a fundamental principle of quantum mechanics that states that linear combinations of solutions to the Schrödinger equation are also solutions of the Schrödinger equation.*
